content: CFS-PL Firestop plug Reusable intumescent firestop solution for permanent or temporary cable openings in walls and floors ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop blocks, plugs, or cushions- - - ### FEATURES:Features Simplifies maintenance and retrofitting of cables – no power tools required Economical solution – sealant-free, ready-to-use and reusable One-sided wall installation possible Ideal for the temporary closing of empty core holes Acoustically tested according to ISO 140 and ASTM E90 Applications Temporary or permanent sealing around cables and cable bundles in wall and floor openings Sealing around cables and cable bundles where immediate functionality after installation is essential Provision of temporary or permanent protection Sealing openings where repenetration and retrofitting of cables is frequent Situations where ease and speed of installation are important For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approx. Density: 0.27 g/cm³ LEED VOC: 4.9 g/l Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 104 °F Technical Data | Approx. Density | 0.27 g/cm³ | LEED VOC | 4.9 g/l | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Application temperature range | 40 - 104 °F | Temperature resistance range | 5 - 140 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2030022 - Firestop plug CFS-PL 4 case of 6 - Package Size 6 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-PL 4 Firestop plug - 2030021 - Firestop plug CFS-PL 2 case of 10 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-PL 2 Firestop plug
